name: Vizhuthukal Trust
briefDescription: Vizhuthukal Trust is a registered non profitable organization formed and functioning by women and working for the development of women domestic workers and their children in Tirunelveli corporation of Tirunelveli of Tamilnadu. With the support of GiveIndia we have support to poor aged by providing food materials and cloth for 1680 poor aged, support to 287 poor students  by providing uniforms and writing materials, supporting ot poor single women by providing 2 goats each for their income generation, providing monthly ration to 60 poor helpless aged every month, enroll of 1821 domestic workers  in the district level fedaration.
